graph_generator module¶

graph_generator.activity_zone(connection, activity_data_frame)¶

If a user is a premium member, add the zone of their activities to their activity dataframe

Parameters:

  • connection – an instance of urllib3 Pool Manager

  • activity_data_frame – dataframe containing id, date, avg watts, max watts

Returns:

returns an updated dataframe with zone data

Return type:

activity_dataframe

graph_generator.dict_to_df(dictionary)¶

Converts a dictionary of authorized user’s activities to a dataframe

Parameters:

dictionary – dictionary containing list of activities

Returns:

dataframe containing all activities

Return type:

data_frame

graph_generator.is_user_premium(connection)¶

Converts a dictionary of authorized user’s activities to a dataframe

Parameters:

connection – an instance of urllib3 Pool Manager

Returns:

returns boolean value for if the user is a strava

premium member

Return type:

boolean

Converts list of acitvities in json form to a Python dictionary.
